tool_description: Manages encryption and decryption of sensitive payment data using industry-standard encryption methods and key rotation.

data_type.description: Type of data (card_number, cvv, personal_info, etc.)

error_messages: Empty data: Cannot encrypt empty or null data.
Invalid data type: Data type must be one of [card_number, cvv, personal_info, transaction_data].
Unsupported encryption method: Use supported methods like AES-256 or RSA-2048.
Key not found: Specified encryption key ID does not exist or is expired.
Encryption failed: Unable to encrypt data due to technical error - verify data format and try again.
usage: Provide data_to_encrypt and specify the data_type. Optionally choose encryption_method and key_id. Returns encrypted data with metadata.

key_id.description: ID of the encryption key used

data_hash.description: Hash of original data for integrity verification
